name: NBX
public_notice: Beyondfi (BYN) has rebranded to NBX (BYN). For more information, please view this announcement on Medium.

description.en: NBX is a DeFi platform powered by zkRollup, Users can swap, stake, farm and use automated routing on Ethereum and zkSync. The use of zero-knowledge proofs lets users benefit from fast transaction speed while maintaining privacy. With some dynamic features, NBX aims to draw a larger user-base with more vibrant activity for new platforms.
